text:
Oh...
Playing Concentration with clams, huh...

It's like a game from the Heian period, isn't it?
You can still play it now.

Yes... Arrange half...
of the clamshells... in a row...

Then, find the matching clamshell...
from the ones arranged on the other side...

Hmm... They all seem to have similar shapes,
so any of them should work.

It may seem that way,
but clamshells are all unique, not a single one is the same.
So, there's only one perfect match.

Well then, shall we have a match from now on?
What will you do if you win?

Then... the prize will be...
croquettes...
